source.name: Digital Wallet Purpose
source.instructions: A digital wallet primarily serves as a key manager for cryptocurrencies and other digital assets, allowing users to store, manage, and transfer various types of digital valuables.
source.guidance: The statement is true. A digital wallet, also known as a crypto wallet, primarily serves as a key manager for cryptocurrencies and other digital assets. It allows users to store, manage, and transfer various digital assets, including cryptocurrencies, digital identities (represented by non-fungible tokens), membership cards, and digital certificates. Digital wallets also enable users to check balances, receive assets, and sign messages to prove ownership of associated addresses.
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT understand the primary purpose of a digital wallet
